name: function 3
function 5
func:
const state = msg.payload.value[0].value.value
const user_id = msg.payload.value[1].value.value
const g_code_name = msg.payload.value[2].value.value
const k_num = msg.payload.value[3].value.value
const output_wp = msg.payload.value[4].value.value
const tool_name = msg.payload.value[5].value.value
const total_cutting_time = msg.payload.value[6].value.value
const calculate_total_cutting_time = msg.payload.value[7].value.value?.toString()

const runningValue = 3
const runningValue2 = 768
const runningCondition = state === runningValue || state === runningValue2
const status = runningCondition ? "Running" : "Stopped"
const name = 'MC-14'


msg.payload = {
    name,
    ipAddress: "192.168.1.14",
    status,
    state,
    user_id,
    output_wp,
    g_code_name,
    k_num,
    tool_name,
    total_cutting_time,
    calculate_total_cutting_time
}


if (state === undefined) {
    msg.payload.status = 'DISCONNECT'
    node.error(`${name} disconnect`, msg);
}


// msg.payload = {state}
return msg;
